abstract: The American health care giant will pay $1 billion to the Irish drug maker Elan to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments.
snippet: The American health care giant will pay $1 billion to the Irish drug maker Elan to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson, the health care giant, will pay $1 billion to the Irish biotechnology company Elan to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments, the companies said Thursday.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Buys Access to an Alzheimer’s Drug
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Buys Access to an Alzheimer’s Drug

abstract: Elan’s shares soared Thursday after Johnson & Johnson said it would pay $1 billion to the Irish drug maker to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments.
snippet: Elan’s shares soared Thursday after Johnson & Johnson said it would pay $1 billion to the Irish drug maker to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments.
lead_paragraph: Elan‘s shares soared Thursday after Johnson & Johnson, the American health care giant, said it would pay $1 billion to the Irish drug maker to gain access to Alzheimer’s disease treatments.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson to Take Stake in Elan
